attributes.title: Build Your Identity as Paramashiva || Nithya Satsang || Retelecast || 01 May 2020
attributes.description:
Title: Build Your Identity as Paramashiva
Name Program: Nithya Satsang with HDH Nithyananda Paramashivam
Session on: How to Build Our Identity as Paramashiva
Date: 01 May 2020

In this Nithya Satsang Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Jagatguru Mahasannidhanam His Divine Holiness Bhagavan #Nithyananda Paramashivam explains from whom you receive your DNA & Genes based on that your body will be built. Same way from whom you receive powerful cognitions and principles of life based on that your Identity will be built. So receive the powerful cognitions and principles of life from Paramashiva so your Identity is built as PARAMASHIVA.
